title: Greece Secures New Bailout Deal From Creditors
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 13, 2015, 08:04 BST - UK Markets close in 8 hrs 26 mins Greece Secures New Bailout Deal From Creditors By (c) Sky News 2015 | Sky News – 5 minutes ago View Photo 

All-night negotiations in Brussels have resulted in a new bailout deal to support Greece and keep it in the eurozone.
